file_content.text: The walkers will secure a landing zone on the beach--you push ahead towards Kephess's camp.
This is Captain Dennik. Picking up some drouks moving in your direction.
The main force is engaging Kephess's troops in the valley. See if you can find an alternate route through the mines.
Double check your targets. Those baradium deposits pack a major punch!
The baradium is on the move. Probably heading for Kephess's base camp.
Captain Dennik here. Enemy reinforcements closing on your position.
Kephess has set up a major baradium processing operation. Could be stocking up for a major galactic offensive!
The Imperial defectors set up camp near the strip mines. Expect them to be heavily armed.
The defectors have set up defensive fortifications in your area. Watch for land mines.
Kephess is targeting your position with heavy artillery! We'll try to draw some of the fire with a frontal assault on his camp.
Take out the Imperial commander! If you can get to his shuttle it'll take you right to Kephess's camp.
We're keeping the pressure on Kephess at the main front. See if you can find an alternate route to get to his camp.
Picking up heavy static in your area. Losing your signal. If you keep going you're on your own.
We thought we'd lost you--good to see you back on the grid! See if you can flank Kephess's camp.
Someone needs to take out that shield generator!
Orbital bombardment is under way--clear out while you still can!
